thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Alstria Office REIT-AG successfully executed capital increase

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alstria Office REIT-AG successfully executed capital increase
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Alstria Office Reit Ag:
* DGAP-ADHOC: ALSTRIA OFFICE REIT-AG SUCCESSFULLY EXECUTED CAPITAL INCREASE
* ‍NEW SHARES PRICED AT EUR 12.60; GROSS PROCEEDS OF EUR 193 MILLION​
* SUCCESSFULLY PLACED 15.3 MILLION NEW NO-PAR VALUE ORDINARY BEARER SHARES WITH INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS IN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILDING PROCESS​
* PROCEEDS TO BE PARTIALLY USED TO FUND C. EUR 87.4 M ACQUISITIONS
* ‍COMPANY THEREBY INCREASES ITS NOMINAL SHARE CAPITAL FROM EUR 153.96 MILLION TO EUR 169.3 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
